entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to setup Blazor custom elements in a WordPress website #46516
  • Blazor wasm DateOnly.DayOfWeek not localized #46511
  • Microsoft.Bcl.HashCode not resolved from generator #46510
    8.0-preview2
  • [Blazor] Consider providing circuits scoped values out of the box #46506
    Backlog
  • [Blazor] Consider making component base interface implementations public #46505
    Backlog
  • [SignalR] Cannot use InvokeAsync While there is an stream ongoing in SignalR #46503
  • Project templates - Add a switch to skip generating IIS profiles in launchSettings.json #46501
    Backlog
  • HTTP/3: Verify HTTP/3 works on expected platforms #46500
  • Convert analyzer strings to localizable strings. #46498
  • Avoid `file private` visibility when targeting LangVersion < 11 #46496
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Benchmark validation doesn't appear to be working on non-Windows OS #46495
    Infrastructure

Closed

  • Skipped: Template and gRPC tests on ARM #28090
    Test failures
  • Source code build Issue #46285
    Infrastructure
  • Idea: .NET 6 Minimal Api - Set dynamic generated access modifier for "Program" class as a "public" not "internal" #38474
    .NET 8 Planning
  • route with product/detail/{id?}-{persionKey?}-{sex?}-{price?} not work #46359
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: json, plaintext, plainTextEmptyFilter #46451
  • The heartbeat has been running for ... which is longer than "00:00:01". ... #46135
  • Microsoft.dotnet-openapi dotnet tool require the highest Microsoft.NETCore.App version #22835
    .NET 8 Planning
  • What's the best choice for a non-root port for ASP.NET Core? #43149
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Handle PlatformNotSupportedException from NegotiateClientCertificateAsync on Mac #46294
    8.0-preview2
  • Add support for validating nullability warnings in RequestDelegateGenerator #46331
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Named pipe caching test #46515
    area-runtime
  • Update milestone for servicing PRs #46514
    area-infrastructure
  • Use HashCode helper class instead of package #46513
  • ServerComparison.FunctionalTests: extend nginx configuration so nginx starts on RHEL and Fedora. #46507
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • HttpSys - clear overlapped handle to prevent multiple release in fault scenario #46504
    area-runtime
  • Greater than 1 FromBody analyzer. #46494
    area-web-frameworks
  • Use Arcade's pool-providers.yml #46493
    area-infrastructure
  • Removing custom ProblemDetails Converters #46492

Merged

  • Add initial parameter support to RequestDelegateGenerator #46407
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `71140c3` to `d925117` #46386
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.15
  • Update branding to 7.0.4 #46509
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `71140c3` to `d925117` #46387
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.4
  • Update branding to 6.0.15 #46508
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.14
  • Add aot option to gRPC template #46462
    area-grpc, 8.0-preview2
  • Update project templates README.md #46497
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview2
  • [blazor] Use JSImport for loading satellite assemblies #46477
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview2
  • [blazor] Use JSImport for lazy loading assemblies #46437
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview2
  • Cache and reuse NamedPipeServerStream instances #46473
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • Add named pipes microbenchmark #46472
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • Update gRPC template dependencies for AOT #46447
    area-grpc, 8.0-preview2
  • Don't close connection on MacOS when getting client certificate #46365
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • Add nullability warning checks to RequestDelegateGeneratorTests #46488
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    blocked, area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update Debian11 Arm64 queue to Debian12 #46419
  • Added operation cancel operation #46330
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Add support for JSON output to more `user-jwts` commands #45431
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add schema support infrastructure #46300
    area-identity, 8.0-preview2
  • [release/7.0] Fix Settings_MaxHeaderListSize_Server #46251
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] Don't throw exception for unresolved type #46078
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Changing reflection-based json configuration #46303
    area-web-frameworks
  • Remove unnecessary code from F# templates #46443
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Allow injection of Gson or JsonParser (or both) when constructing JsonHubProtocol #45555
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Bump up the MIN_PORT for ANCM out of process #46432
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add CssClass property to ValidationSummary #43928
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-alpha.1.23077.6` #46328
    area-infrastructure
  • Consistently return StringValues.Empty instead of default for missing headers #46226
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • UseBlazorFrameworkFiles: add webcil mime type mapping #46244
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Bump ua-parser-js from 0.7.32 to 0.7.33 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #46295
    area-signalr, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, pending-ci-rerun
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime
